LanguageData.VFEA_SuperNanites.label: капсула з супер-нанороботами
LanguageData.VFEA_SuperNanites.description: A container with extremely volatile ancient supernanites. Whilst a large percentage of these nano-robots are faulty, dead or corrupted, a small amount is known to be fully operational, enhancing the person injected with them with unique powers. Super-nanites were used by the long forgotten governments to create supersoldiers, now outlawed by the galactic law.
